title: Drawing, "Sky With Clouds Over Mountain Sides.", August 1868
inscribed:
Recto:   Inscribed in graphite, at various locations with figures; and at top:  3 rich warm lights / and green /  2 blue sum[mit] in shadow / clouds; and at bottom: Aug / 68 / Jung Frau / over.

Verso:  Inscribe in graphite, at various locations with figures, and:  blue grey / occasional warm faint streaks; and at bottom:  2 rich warm yellow lights / with cool shadows below / [date] / near Interlaken
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of narrow steep valley, receding to the cloud capped Jungfrau.

Verso: Horizontal view of sky with clouds over mountain sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sky With Clouds Over Mountain Sides.", August 1868.
August 1868. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-195.
